Texts.Chs: 羊驼袭击者正在攻击一个古老的电子人修道院。防守一方正在寻求你的帮助。
Texts.Eng: Alpaca raiders are threatening an ancient glitch monastery. The defenders look like they could use a little help.
Defeat the leader of the alpaca raiders.

Texts.Chs: 这片土地无比广袤，羊驼在上面隐藏得很好，希望一切都能顺利。
Texts.Eng: These ruins sure are expansive, and the alpaca well-hidden! Hopefully all this was worth it!
